GSD.description:
tty: vt: initialize unicode screen buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit cc9e874dace0c89ae535230c7da19b764746811e. For more details please see the references link.
